name: Spirits Chronicles: Born in Flames Collector's Edition
name_original: Spirits Chronicles: Born in Flames Collector's Edition
description:
People lived in the northern kingdom of Wintersea with the Spirit of Fire. He warmed everything with his flame - and people took care of his fiery creatures in return. However, one day the Spirit of Fire and all his servants suddenly left people and went to the Heavenly Mountains. Since then, the kingdom was terrorized by the ancient Spirit of Cold and her ice monsters.

You are a tamer of magical creatures. Together with your grandmother Dayona, you keep order in the snowy forest. Dayona is known as the best tamer, but now you are to take her place, go on the dangerous expedition, and stop the Spirit of Cold. Otherwise, the kingdom is going to become a snowy grave... Make your way to the main battle by defeating monsters, cracking puzzles, and exploring all the frosty, yet beautiful places of Wintersea to get hidden objects. Your people are waiting for the spring!

This Collector's Edition includes:

Find all the Books of Spells to become a more powerful tamer!
Collect the energy spheres to exchange them for the magical creatures!
Gather all the magical amulets to protect yourself from evil spirits!
Save the Spirit of Fire and restore peace in Wintersea in the Bonus Chapter!
